title: Sweet Potato Casserole
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Butter 2 qt baking dish. Heat, drain, and mash sweet potatoes. Combine with white sugar, eggs, half of the melted butter, milk, and vanilla. Place in dish. In separate bowl mix brown sugar, pecans, flour, and remaining melted butter. Sprinkle over top of potato mixture. Bake for 35 minutes or until knife comes out clean from center.
